title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Minimum Conditions for Examining of Vegetable Species) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) (amendment) regulation 2023

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: 2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of 
Vegetable Species) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 121 of 2004) are amended by 
substituting in Regulation 2 for the definition of “Directive” (as amended by 
European Communities (Minimum Conditions for examining of Vegetable 
Species) (Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 595 of 2022) the following- 
“‘Directive’ means Commission Directive No. 2003/91/EC of 6 October 20032 
as amended by Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2022/1648 of 23 
September 2022;”.
text_norm: 2 european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) regulation 2004 (s.i no 121 2004) amended substituting regulation 2 definition directive (as amended european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) (amendment) regulation 2022 (s.i no 595 2022) following- directive mean commission directive no 2003 91 ec 6 october 20032 amended commission implementing directive (eu) 2022 1648 23 september 2022

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: 3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of
text_raw:
3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of 
Vegetable Species) (Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 595 of 2022) are 
revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 June, 2023. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Charlie McConalogue. 

1 O.J. No. L157, 10.06.2022, p. 1 
2 O.J. No. L254, 08.10.2003, p. 11 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [286] 3

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2022/1648 of 23 September 2022 which amends Council 
Directive 2003/91/EC as regards a derogation for organic varieties of vegetable 
species suitable for organic production. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [286]
